snippet: Chicago beat the Miami Heat, 95-88, after overcoming a 12-point deficit down the stretch and forcing overtime against its frequent playoff nemesis.
abstract: NBA Roundup; Chicago Bulls beat Miami Heat, 95-88, in overtime; other basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Chicago beat the Miami Heat, 95-88, after overcoming a 12-point deficit down the stretch and forcing overtime against its frequent playoff nemesis.

headline.main: For Bulls, a Victory to Replicate
headline.print_headline: For Bulls, a Victory to Replicate
